extendedInfo.description: If you are Michael BublÃ©'s fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Michael BublÃ©'s lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Michael BublÃ©'s lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Michael BublÃ©'s lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)************************Main Features ************************- Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics************************List of albums ************************- Michael BublÃ©- Totally BublÃ©- It's Time- Call reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: Covers all my needs for all my favourite bands! Love it!
reviews.author: Shannon Martin
